title: For Linux
text: Use the button below to download the shell script. This will go into your Downloads (user/downloads).
Move the script into the directory where your project is contained. Do not move your script inside your project.
Open your linux terminal and navigate to the directory where your project is stored inside. This should be the same directory as step 2.

Execute the shell script from inside that directory with the following command, replacing PROJECT_NAME with the EXACT name of your project. It is extremely important that you replace the command with the exact name, otherwise your SBOM will not be generated correctly.
Check to see that your SBOM was created properly. Your SBOM should be titled PROJECT_NAME.json
